claims.object: Visual reference tool for identifying electronic components
Identifying electronic components based on appearance and markings

surface_layer.definition: A visual aid that helps identify electronic components based on their physical characteristics and markings.

deep_layer.mechanism: An electronic component identification chart typically includes illustrations or photographs of common electronic components along with relevant information to aid in identification
deep_layer.origin: Evolved from simple lists to comprehensive visual aids to help engineers and hobbyists

examples: Charts with photographs of resistors and their color codes.
Charts illustrating different types of capacitors and their markings.

epistemic_metadata.source: How to Identify Electronic Components (2026 Guide)
